p:
We first demonstrated that growing human TEC could indeed be infected, and that such infection occurred through the AXL receptor. Moreover, viral particles produced within TEC were infective. Interestingly, the human TEC line could also be infected with other RNA viruses, namely the retrovirus HTLV-1
15 . Moreover, pioneer work has shown that primary cultures of human TEC can also be infected with HIV
12 . This shows that human TEC is permissive to different types of RNA viruses.
